H0.text: The cell wall performs photosynthesis is a statement that describes a primary function of the cell wall of a plant cell.

H1.text: The cell wall stores DNA is the statement that describes a primary function of the cell wall of a plant cell.

H2.text: The cell wall provides structural support, which is a primary function of the cell wall of a plant cell.

H3.text: The cell wall manufactures proteins is the statement that describes a primary function of the cell wall of a plant cell.

A4.text: They may give cells rigidity and strength, offering protection against mechanical stress.

A5.text: In multicellular organisms, they permit the organism to build and hold a definite shape.
